title: Ticket #3817: Default configuration should limit local universe jobs
description:
This is another request from Miron...

Miron wants the default configuration to limit the number of local universe jobs. (Right now that seems to be commented out in the default config.)

The reason for this is that a user at BMRB killed their submit machine by accidentally running a ton of local universe jobs at the same time.
remarks:
2018-Sep-21 10:50:40 by jfrey:
The number of local universe jobs has been limited since 7.4 (#767).
